headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Vehicle Vendetta
content: You’ve raged as the Beast, you’ve hunted as the Slasher, but have you ever turned into a Rhino tank at 60mph only to see yourself get annihilated while Zoned by some jerk on a Shotaro? Didn’t think so, but now’s your chance. This new Adversary Mode pits you and your teammates against an opposing crew of motorized maniacs, all competing for power-ups that can single-handedly turn the tide of battle. Buckle up.
